text: Bahama Passage is a 1941 American romantic drama movie directed by Edward H. Griffith and starring Sterling Hayden, Madeleine Carroll, Flora Robson, Leo G. Carroll, Cecil Kellaway, Leigh Whipper, Dorothy Dandridge. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1941 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Edward H. Griffith Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the Bahamas
title: Bahama Passage
